name: Hyatt Place Jacksonville Airport

reviews.text: This hotel was so much more than I expected from a moderately priced airport hotel. It is stylish and impeccably clean. The room had a comfortable separate living area with a sectional sofa and a large, high quality television. The room had free, high speed internet access. The bed was extremely comfortable. The desk and cafe staff were pleasant and helpful. A pleasant surprise.
reviews.title: What a Pleasant Surprise!

reviews.text: This Hyatt Place is the best hotel I have stayed at in Jacksonville. It is by the airport, which I did not use, but it is worth a bit of a drive if you are downtown.... new, clean, elegant, full service!
reviews.title: New elegance and a sweet night of sleep

reviews.text: Stayed here the night before a flight out on airport. Arrived midday. Staff was excellent. Had lots of local area knowledge. Nice fitness center. Offered wine and munchies in late afternoon and very nice breakfast in the AM. Room was wonderful, very comfortable bed, large tv and sitting area. Bathroom was nicer than most hotels with large tiled shower. Lots of shopping for last minute items in the area and lots of restaurants to eat at. Flight was not until late the next day so was able to return and take shuttle to airport. When I returned they were at the airport to pick me up right away. Would definately stay again and try other Hyatt Place locations. Felt like a little bit of home.
reviews.title: AWEOME!!!

reviews.text: i stayed there on my way home, as a nice stop out of the 1-95. Pros: Huge rooms, big tv screen, nice cosy sofas, good bed, awesome fitness center, free internet and the service was really good the morning after.
reviews.title: great place off the 1-95, nice big room

reviews.text: cons:i would have love to have a heated swimming pool. and a clean one too (cause there was a lot of leaves in the pool) and the shower faucet was gooey and sticky... other than that, everything was good
reviews.title: Finally a Hyatt that is NOT a dump.

reviews.text: I needed lodging near JAX for an early 06:30 flight. I was staying in Gainesville but, that would have meant leaving at 03:00 to catch the 06:30 flight.
reviews.title: Very impressed!

reviews.text: Hotel is amazing. Nice decor, great room and a very comfortable bed.
reviews.title: quick access to highways, businesses, and fantastic value for accommodations

reviews.text: I've stayed at your competitors next door and the Hyatta place blows them out of the water.
reviews.title: A Gem!

reviews.text: The Hyatt Place is fairly new (built in 2009) and a great place for most business travelers. I stayed there for 8 days and was extremely happy with my room and the hotel staff. There was free wifi and a decent continental breakfast each morning (cereal, oatmeal, coffee, juice, and assorted breads and muffins). It's location is near the airport and several major highways. I had a speedy trips driving 9A, I-295S, and I-95S each day. There were several restaurants at the River City Marketplace, including a fantastic Thai restaurant as well as a Super Walmart, movie theater, and Gander Mountain. I would absolutely recommend this hotel for those looking for more upscale accommodations at a good value
reviews.title: Excellent Staff, Excellent Room - new hotel.

reviews.text: What a great find this hotel was. It is incredibly clean, well-appointed, huge rooms and it is totally smoke-free (a huge plus for me personally). It is about five minutes from Jacksonville airport, with a free shuttle service. There is a free continential breakfast, free wi-fi, free parking, and a local shuttle to take you if you need to go some place close by and are car-less. Staff were friendly and helpful. If you need a hotel near JAX, you need not look anywhere else!
reviews.title: Family vacation

reviews.text: When I travel on business I usually stay at Fairfields, Courtyards, Holiday Inn Express, or Hyatt Places because of the free internet and breakfast. When I travel for leisure, I usually stay at Ritz-Carltons, Four Seasons, etc.
reviews.title: I don't usually write reviews, but I had to for this place
Great place to stay!
reviews.text: This is one of the nicest, cleanest, most modern hotels I have ever stayed at. The lobby is visually appealing and clean. The rooms are well laid out and very large. The bathroom has a glass shower instead of the shower/tub combo. The TV is 42", works well, and actually has HiDef channels. The free breakfast is served on china, not crappy styrofoam like Holiday Inn Express and Fairfield Inns. The coffee is Seattle's Best.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Bottom line--this is a great hotel!
reviews.title: Excellent

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Husband and I traveled to Jacksonville to attend The Players Championship gold tournament. Great location! Didn't have to go through downtown and
reviews.title: Beautiful room at a great price!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: a nice drive to the course. Hotel has comfortable beds and was very clean!
reviews.title: superb hotel

reviews.text: Booked two rooms for one night through Priceline. We had a late flight that evening and didn't arrive at the Hyatt Place until after 11 p.m. We were also leaving the next morning so it seemed like a better option to try Priceline than booking straight out. We were very pleased to receive the HP. Stayed at a HP one time before near Baltimore's airport and that was a great experience. Plenty of free parking for our rental car. Very stylish lobby area and there were free green apples and newspapers for the taking. The room was extremely clean and everything was in order. Wished we could have taken advantage of the exercise room but time prohibited though it looked just fine. One in our party made it down to the continental breakfast and was pleased with his choices. There was a nice area to eat in as well as an outdoor area. Great location near the airport but we heard no sounds whatsoever. Also, Interestate 95 was extremely close. The free Internet was very nice. Would love to stay here again and wouldn't hestitate to try other Hyatt Place locations.
reviews.title: Another positive review for the Hyatt Place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hyatt Place is a nice respite for an airport hotel.
reviews.title: Pleasant Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You can't beat the convenience to the airport-- only 5 minutes away and the
reviews.title: Great place!

reviews.text: hotel offers a free shuttle service 24/7 (every 30 minutes).
reviews.title: Unusual Location, Modern Feel, A la Carte Everything

reviews.text: Check-in was quick and hassle free. The atmosphere was comfortable and the lobby
reviews.title: Brandnew very nice hotel.

aka: Hyatt Place Jacksonville Airport Hotel Jacksonville
description: The Hyatt Place Jacksonville Airport is the newest property in the area. Hyatt Place offers complimentary shuttle service to and from Jacksonville International Airport. 127 well appointed rooms with a 42 inch HD television set, the Hyatt Grand Bed, and 24 hour food service all are yours at the Hyatt Place Jacksonville Airport.
